description: Try our easy to follow Vegetable Stock recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stock & broth,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vegetable Stock Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a stockpot over medium-high heat. Add vegetables and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until just golden.

Add parsley, bay leaves, peppercorns and 12 cups cold water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer uncovered, skimming the surface occasionally, for 1 hour. Remove from heat. Set aside to cool.
Strain, discarding solids, into a bowl.
